attributes.action: REDUCE ADMINISTRATION AND TICK BOX EXERCISES FOR FRONT LINE HEALTH STAFF
attributes.additional_details:
In many areas of health care there is an ever increasing demand upon health care professionals to perform tick box exercises and administrative tasks that add little to the overall care and outcome for a patient.

Ask the DOH to investigate what demands are being made by each Health Trust upon front line staff, and to consider options to reduce this burden.
